title: TPACK-Based Teacher Digital Competency Enhancement Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: A blended training program for mathematics teachers in an online university setting. Operating project-based assessments based on a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in designing digital lessons utilizing all seven knowledge domains of the TPACK framework.
Learners can explain effective integration methods for incorporating generative AI and digital tools into mathematics instruction.
Develop at least two types of digital learning materials incorporating active learning strategies (discussion, collaboration, problem-solving).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
